subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: McGehee, the Brewers’ third baseman, homered three times and Milwaukee rallied at home to beat the St. Louis Cardinals, 10-5, and add to their National League Central lead.
snippet: McGehee, the Brewers’ third baseman, homered three times and Milwaukee rallied at home to beat the St. Louis Cardinals, 10-5, and add to their National League Central lead.
